Class ClassScope

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.pmd.cpd.cppast.Scope
      net.sourceforge.pmd.cpd.cppast.ClassScope
public class ClassScope
extends Scope

Class scope extends Scope in that its search method also searches all its superclasses.
